action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several pixelated shapes in different colors on a white background. There are green, purple, pink, and orange shapes arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The shapes are blocky and resemble Tetris pieces.

There is a purple cross shape at the top left, three green shapes resembling the letter "T" in the middle, two orange shapes resembling the letter "Z" at the bottom left and middle, and two pink shapes resembling the letter "T" at the top right and bottom right.
